pages.title: Controller
pages.text: Single-block caster for barrels, cannon barrels, projectiles, and components. GUI slots: template on the left, metal input on the right. Outputs leave the right face; keep it clear with conveyors or pipes.

pages.title: Heat Source
pages.text: Place directly above a firebox: electric_firebox, firebox, or oil_firebox. If the firebox is cold or missing, the foundry will not run. A basic fuel firebox burns roughly 2s per coal even when idleâ€”plan storage accordingly.
